column5: I spent a couple of hours today hoping to reacquaint myself with the good old carp after the long winter, but alas, it wasn't to be.  Has anyone else begun carping yet?

I was out yesterday just preapring the areas I fish. Then I gave a try..... nothing.  Time to do the leg work and hunt them out.  Nothing at the island yet either. Water temps have to warm up more in some areas.  dsn
It's suppose to warm up this weekend!
I've been trying some new areas. Used corn worm, strawberry doe but nothing.
I got a few last weekend nothing big 2 or 3 pounds.But they were all over the place though.
Yup in the last two weeks have probably caught 20 or more......  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z3aubIxDWGo

Back when I lived in London (ON) I  used to start carpin in the River in Mid April.  Mind you, this april has been especially chilly so that might effect things a bit.  Keep at it and you'll get on some real soon.

I don't start until May and even then it is very challenging to hook into multiples.  Lots of big fish but we need a nice warm spell for probably 2 weeks to get them going.  This April has been tough for sure as far as cold weather.  Give it till May if this warm spell stays with us.

gone out 5 times over the last 3 weeks and not even a single hit ... used canned corn and worms now that it's finally warming up ... it might take a while for them to finish all the groundbait/chum that's still out there lol
The weather looks beautiful for this weekend; hopefully it will wake them up and get their metabolism going.

Yeah, went to college in london, last three years I was able to start getting them at the beginning of april!  Can't wait for this years carp season.....there's to many damn species out there!  I wanna fish them all! haha  UF
